event.title: The Big Game
event.description: Experience the ultimate showdown! Join thousands of fans for an unforgettable game day at SAP Center.
event.address: 525 W Santa Clara St, San Jose, CA 95113

sharkey.greeting: Welcome to SAP Center! I'm Sharkey, your tour guide!
sharkey.funFact: Did you know SAP Center is home to the San Jose Sharks and hosts over 200 events per year?
sharkey.tip: Arrive early to explore the Sharks Store and grab some teal gear!

event.title: March Madness Watch Party
event.description: Catch all the tournament action on giant screens across downtown venues. Cheer, eat, and celebrate with fellow basketball fans!

sharkey.greeting: Hey there! Downtown SJ is buzzing with March Madness energy!
sharkey.funFact: San Jose's downtown has over 40 restaurants and bars showing the games!
sharkey.tip: Check out San Pedro Square Market for the best viewing atmosphere!

event.title: World Cup Viewing Party
event.description: Cheer for your team with fans from around the world in the heart of SJ. International food, drinks, and non-stop soccer action!
event.address: 87 N San Pedro St, San Jose, CA 95110

sharkey.greeting: Â¡Hola! Welcome to San Pedro Square - World Cup central!
sharkey.funFact: This historic market has been a gathering place since 1863!
sharkey.tip: Try food from different countries while watching their teams play!

event.title: Soccer Tournament
event.description: Home of the San Jose Earthquakes, this stadium will host exciting soccer matches during the tournament season.

sharkey.greeting: Welcome to Avaya Stadium - the epicenter of Bay Area soccer!
sharkey.funFact: This is the first cloud-enabled venue in Major League Soccer!
sharkey.tip: The supporters' section here is legendary - join the chants!

event.title: Championship Events
event.description: Experience world-class sporting events at this state-of-the-art stadium in nearby Santa Clara.
event.address: 4900 Marie P DeBartolo Way, Santa Clara, CA 95054

sharkey.greeting: You've reached Levi's Stadium - home of champions!
sharkey.funFact: This stadium hosted Super Bowl 50 and is LEED Gold certified!
sharkey.tip: Download the stadium app for exclusive content and wayfinding!

metadata.description: Follow Sharkey through San Jose's premier sporting venues and events for the 2026 season
